attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review:
This app took forever to download almost two hours. I simply wanted to support our president but once I installed it, it kept glitching out and taking me back to the home screen. I’m not sure what you guys would think about this but I think it’s a sign that trump 2020✨ in jail💫 

Xoxo gossip girl 
You know you love me😉

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: This is a HORRIBLE APP! Once I opened the app my phone immediately started to glitch uncontrollably! I had to take my phone to get it fixed and they told me this glitch was unfixable!!!! I had to get a new phone and everything! I was hoping i could help out our amazing President, but this app was just not it! PLEASE DO NOT DOWN LOAD!!!!! Trump 2020

attributes.title: The worst app I’ve ever seen
attributes.review: first of all the app was super slow, giving my phone even after I deleted it lag. then when I tried to sign up the app went from me entering my phone number to a orange face with a guy in a sand colored toupee? I don’t know what’s wrong with this app but it needs to be checked out 😾

attributes.title: Terrible terribleness
attributes.review: Every time I open the app it locks up my phone. Then my brother tried to fix it and the screen started flashing and enduced a seizure. I am now in the er waiting to hear of my brother will be okay bc on his fall to the ground he cracked open his head on the corner of our kitchen table. Please keep us in your prayers.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: THIS APP IS SO RACIST as soon as i opened it ice came to my house and took me away because i’m mexican ! then they proceeded to put me in a cage and separate me from my entire family. The kids around me are being sent to sex trafficking. They Gave is foil as blankets & they mistreat me and every one here i don’t understand why i’m here if no body is legal on stolen land ! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP OR VOTING FOR TRUMP🇲🇽.

attributes.title: Racist orange crayon
attributes.review: This is such a horrible app I don’t even comprehend how anyone could even want this app when I opened the app my eyes immediately burned of my face when I saw the great big 🍊then my whole face melted off because he was so orange I wanted to use him as a crayon and all his orange pigment would come off while drawing with the racist orange crayon

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD (SAVE UR NOSTRILS)
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I fully and wholeheartedly worship our president even though he looks like fore skin. After downloading the app, it made my entire phone smell like rotting corpses and Donald’s earlobes. In fact, the smell was so bad I threw up all over my phone and now I have to get it repaired. I’m writing this review through my etch a sketch.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch badly while it was downloading. The app took about more than 6 months to download, which is ridiculous. When I opened the app it wasn’t working at all and then my phone got hacked. I do not recommend getting this app under any circumstances! Worst app I have ever downloaded!!

attributes.title: On the verge of death
attributes.review: When I opened the app it kept shocking me and turning off my phone!! Absolutely horrendous. It also kept showing me a Cheeto before it’d shock me and power off😡😡 I expected better!! Now I’m scared to even get rid of the app because it said that if I deleted it, they would make sure I’d be in the hospital!!😢

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: This app took so much storage and time to download. I cannot stress how much this app has made my life worst. I went from a having an IQ of an average human being to having an IQ of a potato after having this app. I’m not sure why that happened, but one thing I know for sure is that this app has made my life TERRIBLE!
